A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a star wars fanatic ever since my dad showed me them. I loved all of the movies thus far\, some more then others but loved them all the same. Now that I have set the context of my fandom. I want to be frank\, i made an account just to write this. Words do not describe my disappointment in this film. I would of been able to accept all of the story direction even though its not what i wanted. If the movie itself wasnt a train wreck of a movie. Its not thay its a \"bad star wars\" so much that it is a terrible movie. No amount of fandom can buy you leniency for this horrible addition to the saga.
